entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
